channel.title: 🏢 School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence, Arizona State University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence, Arizona State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Learning Low-Rank Feature for Thorax Disease Classification
item.description: Low-Rank Feature Learning (LRFL) significantly boosts thorax disease classification accuracy by reducing noise and background interference in medical images.
